#define GetPKeyRSA ( obj,
pkey   ) 
Value:
do { \
    GetPKey((obj), (pkey)); \
    if (EVP_PKEY_type((pkey)->type) != EVP_PKEY_RSA) { /* PARANOIA? */ \
        ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "THIS IS NOT A RSA!") ; \
    } \
} while (0)
